entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as one of the people flying in the airship. He and Professor McGonagall are bending forward to look at something inside a bundle of blankets.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as one of the people flying in the airship. She and Dumbledore are bending forward to look at something inside a bundle of blankets.

entities.name: baby boy
entities.description: A baby boy is visible inside the bundle of blankets that Dumbledore and Professor McGonagall are looking at.

entities.name: bristol
entities.description: Bristol is mentioned as a location that the airship is flying over.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are mentioned as people who will start swarming around when they see something unusual happening in the sky.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Professor McGonagall are bending forward together to look at something inside a bundle of blankets.
The baby boy is visible to Dumbledore as he looks into the bundle of blankets.
The baby boy is visible to Professor McGonagall as she looks into the bundle of blankets.
